Todo List

Class ScheatorDb.SqlQueryEngine

getItems() and deleteItems do not support varchar (=String) type search fields as the values should be enclosed in single quotes. This is done in addItem() but since I don't need this feature it has not been implemented.

Member ScheatorDb::Series.Series ()

Only Sql databases supported at the moment.

Member ScheatorDb::SqlQueryEngine.getItems (String[] table, String[] fields, String[] idFields, String[] ids, String[] orderBy)

get and delete do not add escape characters for String type fields.

Member ScheatorView::MainTablePanel.print ()
Add more sophisticated printing by returning a Printable object from this class to a caller.
